markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hunter's Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=4867) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 158 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169) (Level 6)

</column>

---

When you focus on aiming, your attack becomes particularly accurate. Make a ranged weapon Strike against your hunted prey. On this Strike, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore your prey’s concealed condition and any lesser cover.
name: Hunter's Aim
